New Records: LeBron and Bronny James became the first father and son to play together in NBA history.
Key Match Events: LeBron James scored 19 points in 16 minutes.
LeBron and Bronny James shared the court for four minutes and nine seconds.
Post-Match Reflections: LeBron James expressed immense pride and joy in playing alongside his son Bronny, calling it one of the greatest moments of his career.
LeBron James advised his son to keep improving and making winning plays.
Coach JJ Redick expressed his excitement about facilitating the father-son duo's time on the court, highlighting LeBron's longevity and Bronny's hard work.
